import React from "react"; const Experience = () => { return (

Scholarship

Frontend con React in Platzi 2022
Backend con Node.js in Platzi 2022
AWS in Platzi 2022
Laboratoria 2020-2021
GreenYoga México 2020-2021
Biology Universidad Nacional Autónoma de México (UNAM) 2011-2015


Nowports

Fullstack JS (layoffs)
August 2022 - March 2023
Participating in the finance area In the SCRUM teams working on the 25% refactor in the account statement, shipping section and billing in different countries. In Kanban, working on 35% of the bugfixes and hotfixes in the billing sections, credit notes, partial payment, mass payment, and customer account statements and their shipments. Using React, Node.js, Express, MySQL, tablePlus, testing React Apps, Ant Design and Docker mainly. Competing in the internal Nowports Hackathon won 3rd place.


Clip

Fullstack Jr JS
November 2021 - August 2022
Working 80% in the technical support area in planning the flows to connect with different applications such as Okta, Zendesk, BambooHR and Salesforce. Collaborating with the tech leads of engineering and architecture teams to achieve the objectives. Reviewing 100% of the creation of the clip carrers page in the prototype phase as the engineering vision. Using mainly AWS, Node.js and Express. Being the only developer in the area.

) }; export default Experience;
